Title: Relates to exempting the village historian of Port Chester from the residency requirement
Summary: Exempts the village historian of Port Chester from the residency requirement so that the historian need only be a resident of the state.
LawCode: Amd ยง3, Pub Off L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public officers law, in relation to exempting the village historian for the village of Port Chester from the residency requirement
